data.comment: The match has started.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Columbus.
In the minute 6, Goal kick for Philadelphia at Mapfre Stadium.
Throw-in for Columbus in the half of Philadelphia.
Throw-in for Columbus close to the penalty box.
In the minute 14, Throw-in for Columbus at Mapfre Stadium.
Milton Valenzuela (Columbus) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Columbus have been awarded a corner by Robert Sibiga.
In the minute 20, Free kick Columbus.
Ball goes out of play for a Columbus goal kick.
Philadelphia have a goal kick.
In the minute 27, Corner awarded to Philadelphia.
Columbus needs to be cautious. Philadelphia have an attacking throw-in.
Robert Sibiga awards Columbus a goal kick.
In the minute 29, Ball safe as Philadelphia is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Robert Sibiga awards the home team a throw-in.
Goal kick for Philadelphia at Mapfre Stadium.
In the minute 32, Ball goes out of play for a Columbus goal kick.
Corner awarded to Philadelphia.
Philadelphia have been awarded a corner by Robert Sibiga.
In the minute 34, It's a goal kick for the home team in Columbus.
Columbus have been awarded a corner by Robert Sibiga.
Free kick for Philadelphia in their own half.
In the minute 39, In Columbus Columbus drive forward through Lucas Zelarrayan. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Robert Sibiga signals a free kick to Philadelphia in their own half.
Can Columbus get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Philadelphia's half?
In the minute 41, Robert Sibiga awards Philadelphia a goal kick.
In Columbus a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Jamiro Monteiro (Philadelphia) has received a yellow card from Robert Sibiga.
In the minute 45, Columbus are in shooting range from this free kick.
Philadelphia have a goal kick.
2 minutes will be added to the 1st half in Columbus.
In the minute 45, Robert Sibiga signals a free kick to Philadelphia.
Corner awarded to Philadelphia.
Robert Sibiga awards Columbus a goal kick.
In the minute 45, The first-half is over at Mapfre Stadium.
The second half has started at Mapfre Stadium.
Throw-in Philadelphia.
In the minute 47, Robert Sibiga signals a Philadelphia throw-in in Columbus's half.
Throw-in for Columbus in their own half.
Columbus have been awarded a corner by Robert Sibiga.
In the minute 49, Corner awarded to Columbus.
Columbus have been awarded a corner by Robert Sibiga.
Ball goes out of play for a Philadelphia goal kick.
In the minute 52, Philadelphia have a goal kick.
Jonathan Mensah is booked for the home team.
Columbus awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 54, Alejandro Bedoya for Philadelphia has been booked by Robert Sibiga and receives a first yellow card.
Goal! Lucas Zelarrayan gives Columbus a 1-0 lead in Columbus.
Pedro Santos with an assist there.
In the minute 58, Attention is being given to Philadelphiaâ€™s Jose Martinez and play has been suspended briefly.
Columbus awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Jose Martinez is back on his feet again.
In the minute 61, It's a goal kick for the away team in Columbus.
In the minute 62, In Columbus, Philadelphia push forward quickly but are pulled up for offside.
Warren Creavalle is on a sub for Alejandro Bedoya for Philadelphia.
The away team replace Brendan Aaronson with Ilsinho.
Corner awarded to Columbus.
Goal kick for Philadelphia at Mapfre Stadium.
In the minute 68, It's a goal kick for the home team in Columbus.
Derrick Etienne is replacing Youness Mokhtar for the home team.
Robert Sibiga signals a free kick to Columbus in their own half.
In the minute 71, Philadelphia to take a throw-in in Columbus territory.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Columbus awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 74, Throw-in for Philadelphia in the half of Columbus.
Philadelphia make their third substitution with Andrew Wooten replacing Sergio Santos.
The away team have replaced Olivier Mbaizo with Matt Real. This is the fourth substitution made today by Jim Curtin.
In the minute 77, Goal kick for Columbus at Mapfre Stadium.
Ball goes out of play for a Columbus goal kick.
Caleb Porter is making the team's second substitution at Mapfre Stadium with Fanendo Adi replacing Gyasi Zardes.
In the minute 81, Free kick for Columbus in their own half.
Free kick for Columbus in the half of Philadelphia.
Corner awarded to Columbus.
In the minute 83, In Columbus a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Throw-in for Philadelphia in their own half.
Columbus have a goal kick.
Robert Sibiga awards Philadelphia a goal kick.
At Mapfre Stadium the fourth official shows that 3 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
Throw-in for Columbus at Mapfre Stadium.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Philadelphia have been awarded a corner by Robert Sibiga.
Corner awarded to Philadelphia.
The second-half is over. The match ends 1-0.
